title: Rejected As A Mars One Astronaut Candidate, She's Turning To Plan B (Or M)
teaser: Aspiring Martian Heidi Beemer found out she didn't make the cut for the latest round of astronaut candidates for Mars One, a nonprofit that hopes to settle humans on Mars by 2025.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
